feedback.includeSystemInfo: Include system information (app version, OS info)

feedback.placeholders.feature: Please describe the needed feature and the reason for it.

feedback.tipBugReport: For bug reports: clearly describe reproduction steps and expected behavior
feedback.tipFeatureRequest: For feature requests: explain what problem you're trying to solve
feedback.tipScreenshot: If you have screenshots, please attach them to the email
